21  from imusim.trajectories.sampled import SampledPositionTrajectory, SampledRotationTrajectory 
22  from imusim.algorithms.vector_observation import DavenportQ 
23  from imusim.maths.quaternions import QuaternionArray 
24  from imusim.utilities.time_series import TimeSeries 
25  import numpy as np 
26   

27 -class MultiMarkerTrajectory(SampledPositionTrajectory, SampledRotationTrajectory): 

28   

29 -    def __init__(self, posMarker, refMarkers, refVectors=None, refTime=0): 

30          self.posMarker = posMarker 
31          self.refMarkers = refMarkers 
32          if refVectors is None: 
33              self.refVectors = [ 
34                  refMarker.position(refTime) - posMarker.position(refTime) 
35                      for refMarker in self.refMarkers] 
36          else: 
37              self.refVectors = refVectors 
38          assert(~np.any(np.isnan(self.refVectors))) 
39   
40          self.positionKeyFrames = self.posMarker.positionKeyFrames 
41          t = self.positionKeyFrames.timestamps 
42          vectorObservation = DavenportQ(self.refVectors) 
43          measVectors = np.array([ref.position(t) - self.posMarker.position(t) 
44              for ref in self.refMarkers]) 
45          rotations = QuaternionArray([ 
46              vectorObservation(*vectors).conjugate for vectors in 
47                  np.split(measVectors, len(t), axis=2)]) 
48          self.rotationKeyFrames = TimeSeries(t, rotations)
